data.name: AppFullName
data.value: .NET Test Driver

data.name: AppDescription
data.value: Test Driver for the .NET Platform

data.name: CmdSettingsFile
data.value: SETTINGS_FILE

data.name: CmdSettingsDescription
data.value: The settings file to use when running tests.

data.name: CmdListTestsDescription
data.value: List the discovered tests instead of running the tests.

data.name: CmdTestCaseFilterExpression
data.value: EXPRESSION

data.name: CmdTestCaseFilterDescription
data.value: Run tests that match the given expression. Examples: Run tests with priority set to 1: --filter "Priority = 1" Run a test with the specified full name: --filter "FullyQualifiedName=Namespace.ClassName.MethodName" Run tests that contain the specified name: --filter "FullyQualifiedName~Namespace.Class" See https://aka.ms/vstest-filtering for more information on filtering support.

data.name: CmdTestAdapterPathDescription
data.value: The path to the custom adapters to use for the test run.

data.name: CmdTestAdapterPath
data.value: ADAPTER_PATH

data.name: CmdLoggerOption
data.value: LOGGER

data.name: CmdLoggerDescription
data.value: The logger to use for test results. Examples: Log in trx format using a unique file name: --logger trx Log in trx format using the specified file name: --logger "trx;LogFileName=<TestResults.trx>" See https://aka.ms/vstest-report for more information on logger arguments.

data.name: CmdOutputDir
data.value: OUTPUT_DIR

data.name: CmdOutputDescription
data.value: The output directory to place built artifacts in.

data.name: CmdPathToLogFile
data.value: LOG_FILE

data.name: CmdPathTologFileDescription
data.value: Enable verbose logging to the specified file.

data.name: CmdNoBuildDescription
data.value: Do not build the project before testing. Implies --no-restore.

data.name: CmdResultsDirectoryDescription
data.value: The directory where the test results will be placed. The specified directory will be created if it does not exist.

data.name: CmdPathToResultsDirectory
data.value: RESULTS_DIR

data.name: RunSettingsArgumentsDescription
data.value: RunSettings arguments: Arguments to pass as RunSettings configurations. Arguments are specified as '[name]=[value]' pairs after "-- " (note the space after --). Use a space to separate multiple '[name]=[value]' pairs. See https://aka.ms/vstest-runsettings-arguments for more information on RunSettings arguments. Example: dotnet test -- MSTest.DeploymentEnabled=false MSTest.MapInconclusiveToFailed=True

data.name: cmdCollectFriendlyName
data.value: DATA_COLLECTOR_NAME

data.name: cmdCollectDescription
data.value: The friendly name of the data collector to use for the test run. More info here: https://aka.ms/vstest-collect

data.name: CmdBlameDescription
data.value: Run the tests in blame mode. This option is helpful in isolating a problematic test causing the test host to crash. Outputs a 'Sequence.xml' file in the current directory that captures the order of execution of test before the crash.

data.name: FrameworkOptionDescription
data.value: The target framework to run tests for. The target framework must also be specified in the project file.

data.name: RuntimeOptionDescription
data.value: The target runtime to test for.

data.name: ConfigurationOptionDescription
data.value: The configuration to use for running tests. The default for most projects is 'Debug'.

data.name: CmdNoLogo
data.value: Run test(s), without displaying Microsoft Testplatform banner

data.name: IgnoredArgumentsMessage
data.value: The following arguments have been ignored : "{0}"
